title: Roto 360 - HD Watch Face
summary: An Opportune watch face for Moto 360, LG G Watch R & others Smart watch
description: Model NumberDW-A16CategoryRotoProduct description Rigid Watch Face is an Adequate watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).this watch face is better then Stealth360 & Minimus360 by FlyingRhinoCMG it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features•	Amazing Multi-Directional Rotation•	Smooth Needles•	Day•	1.6 Billions Colors Theme•	Custom Ambient Mode•	Default Ambient Mode Pack•	Square & Round Watches SupportAnd it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates, don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!Follow Us on Twitter !  http://www.twitter.com/droiipd Like Us on Facebook !  http://www.facebook.com/droiipdFollow Us on Instagram !  https://www.instagram.com/droiipdFollow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188It has following featuresFeatures: •	Amazing Multi-Directional Rotation•	Smooth Needles•	Day•	1.6 Billions Colors Theme•	Custom Ambient Mode•	Default Ambient Mode Pack•	Square & Round Watches SupportConfiguration:  ✔Turn On/Off Rotation✔Pick Your Favorite Color ✔pick your favorite ambient mode For Email support Contact us at  droiipd@gmail.comTip 1Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watchesTip 2✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)2. Uninstall the watch face3. Restart watch and connect device again4. Then finally install the watch faceTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Rigid Watch Face as your watch faceNotePlease, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches... (Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
descriptionHTML:
Model Number
DW-A16

Category
Roto

Product description

Rigid Watch Face is an Adequate watch face for all smart watches, an active pushy design makes it a superb gadget (It has been tested on Moto 360, LG G Watch R and Sony Smart watch 3).this watch face is better then Stealth360 & Minimus360 by FlyingRhinoCMG it is available for all kind of watches including round and rectangle. it has customization feature which allows you to change watch face needle style (Tick or Smooth).it has following features

• Amazing Multi-Directional Rotation
• Smooth Needles
• Day
• 1.6 Billions Colors Theme
• Custom Ambient Mode
• Default Ambient Mode Pack
• Square & Round Watches Support

And it doesn't end yet, follow the new customization options, features and updates,
don't forget to make a comment and please kindly leave your feedback and suggestions!
(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)


Keep an eye out for our others watch face creations that are coming out soon!
Follow Us on Twitter ! http://www.twitter.com/droiipd
Like Us on Facebook ! http://www.facebook.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Instagram ! https://www.instagram.com/droiipd
Follow Us on Google Plus ! https://plus.google.com/104043898612133973188
It has following features

Features:
• Amazing Multi-Directional Rotation
• Smooth Needles
• Day
• 1.6 Billions Colors Theme
• Custom Ambient Mode
• Default Ambient Mode Pack
• Square & Round Watches Support

Configuration:
✔Turn On/Off Rotation
✔Pick Your Favorite Color
✔pick your favorite ambient mode

For Email support Contact us at droiipd@gmail.com

Tip 1
Now we support 280x280 and 320x320 square watches
Tip 2
✔ If the watch face is not shown on your watch after re-sync, try these steps:
1. Disconnect devices (watch and phone)
2. Uninstall the watch face
3. Restart watch and connect device again
4. Then finally install the watch face
To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Rigid Watch Face as your watch face
Note

Please, rate us positive if you like our watch faces! Don't give a bad rating too soon. If you experienced a problem, please, send us an email and we will be happy to answer it and fix an issue soon as possible.
Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, Sony smart watches...

(Note: You can do all the customization from the Our Mobile App, you can open our mobile app from you application menu)

And that is not the end of it watch for the new customization options and features coming soon, and we'd love to hear from you what you would like to see on it!
comments: Neat watch Great looking watch face, plenty of features without having to buy pro version.
Very nice, one of my favourite watch face
It is a very nice watch face i really enjoyed its UI. Keep it Up
Nicely done watch On my GWR, it looks great. Wish I could change the style if the hands and colorize them too. No ambient colors?
Keeps crashing G watch R. When I set it from the watch, it just keeps crashing.
